MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH51 postcode area of Bo'Ness. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:42am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties locating the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:37am on Thursday, 11 February 2021
